page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: In the 1970's a central area of Baldock, the site of Pryor's (later Simpsons) brewery was redeveloped. Most of the brewery buildings were demolished, and replaced with a housing estate, with access to the High Street. Part of the brew house was retained and converted into a community centre. A large housing estate is now under construction on Clothall Common, land NE of the Clothall road. The associated increase in population required the construction of a new primary school. No housing estate development is allowed in other parts of the area, which forms part of the Hertfordshire green belt.
